#summary XML-RPC Methods and Description

|| Method || Usage || Return Value ||
|| start_zserv() || {{{start_zserv(zserv_name)}}} || True on Success ||
|| start_all_zservs() || {{{start_all_zservs()}}} || True on Success ||
|| stop_zserv() || {{{stop_zserv(zserv_name)}}} || True on Success ||
|| stop_all_zservs() || {{{stop_all_zservs()}}} || True on Success ||
|| restart_zserv() || {{{restart_zserv(zserv_name)}}} || True on Success ||
|| restart_all_zservs() || {{{restart_all_zservs()}}} || True on Success ||
|| get_uptime() || {{{get_uptime(zserv_name)}}} || seconds as an int ||
|| get_zserv() || {{{get_zserv(zserv_name)}}} || a ZservDict ||
|| get_all_zservs() || {{{get_all_zservs()}}} || a list of ZservDict ||
|| list_zserv_names() || {{{list_zserv_names()}}} || a list of zserv names as strings ||
|| get_current_map() || {{{get_current_map(zserv_name)}}} || a MapDict ||
|| get_team() || {{{get_team(zserv_name, team_color)}}} || a TeamDict ||
|| get_all_teams() || {{{get_all_teams(zserv_name)}}} || a list of TeamDicts ||
|| get_player() || {{{get_player(zserv_name, player_name)}}} || a PlayerDict ||
|| get_all_players() || {{{get_all_players(zserv_name)}}} || a list of PlayerDicts ||
|| list_player_names() || {{{list_player_names(zserv_name)}}} || a list of player names as strings ||
|| get_remembered_stats() || {{{get_remembered_stats(zserv_name, back=1)}}} || a StatDict ||
|| get_status() || {{{get_status(zserv_name)}}} || ZServ status as a string, either 'Stopped' or 'Running' ||
|| reload_config() || {{{reload_config(zserv_name)}}} || True on success ||
|| reload_all_configs() || {{{reload_all_configs()}}} || True on success ||
|| send_to_zserv() || {{{send_to_zserv(zserv_name, message, return_lines=40)}}} || a list of General log lines as strings ||
